trans-unit.source: Provides information about a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell" /> to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce informazioni su un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell" /> alle applicazioni client di accessibilità.

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms includes built-in accessibility support that allows your application to work with accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Windows Form include il supporto di accessibilità integrate che consente all'applicazione di usare con le applicazioni client di accessibilità.

trans-unit.source: Examples of accessibility client applications include screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities.
trans-unit.target: Esempi di applicazioni client di accessibilità sono incluse funzionalità di utilità di ingrandimento e schermata, le utilità di input vocale, tastiere su dispositivi di input alternativi e le utilità di miglioramento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject> class inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class to provide information about a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject> classe eredita il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> classe per fornire informazioni su un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> alle applicazioni client di accessibilità.

trans-unit.source: Each class that represents a visual part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>—such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>—also contains a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Ogni classe che rappresenta una parte di visual il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>, contiene anche una classe che eredita da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> per fornire informazioni sulla classe contenitore e eseguire azioni per conto di applicazioni client di accessibilità.

trans-unit.source: There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Vi sono casi in cui è possibile fornire informazioni aggiuntive, ad esempio il nome o descrizione del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controllo, per applicazioni client di accessibilità.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of providing this additional information.
trans-unit.target: Esistono due modi per fornire queste informazioni aggiuntive.

trans-unit.source: To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Per fornire informazioni limitate sull'accessibilità per i controlli esistenti, impostare il controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> i valori delle proprietà che verranno segnalati alle applicazioni client di accessibilità.

trans-unit.source: You should change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> look like a list.
trans-unit.target: È necessario modificare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> i valori delle proprietà solo in rare situazioni, ad esempio se è rendere una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> simile a un elenco.

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: In alcuni casi, si potrebbe richiedere ulteriori informazioni sull'accessibilità o azioni di accessibilità diversa per l'inclusione personalizzato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.

trans-unit.source: To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> classes and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per personalizzare l'accessibilità, è possibile scrivere la propria classe da cui deriva il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> classi ed eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> class and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si scrive una cella di intestazione di riga personalizzato che implementa le azioni personalizzate univoche, ad esempio l'hit test speciali all'interno della cella, si deve creare una classe che eredita dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> classe ed eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> exposes its data structure by using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole> values to define the data table hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> espone la struttura di dati utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole> gerarchia valori per definire i dati delle tabelle.

trans-unit.source: For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see "Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'esposizione delle tabelle di dati a Microsoft Active Accessibility, vedere "Esposizione di dati tabelle tramite Microsoft Active Accessibility" in MSDN all'indirizzo http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell" /> che possiede la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location and size of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la posizione e le dimensioni dell'oggetto accessibile.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> che rappresenta i limiti dell'oggetto accessibile.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the default action of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa che descrive l'azione predefinita dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the default action of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />
trans-unit.target: Stringa che descrive l'azione predefinita dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> belongs to a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic>, this property returns the string "Press to sort column".
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> appartiene a una colonna con un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> valore della proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic>, questa proprietà restituisce la stringa "Premere per ordinare la colonna".

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect>, this property returns the string "Press to select column".
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controllo ha un valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect>, questa proprietà restituisce la stringa "Premere per selezionare la colonna".

trans-unit.source: If neither of these conditions is present or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> does not currently belong to a column, this property returns <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Se nessuna di queste condizioni è presente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> attualmente non appartiene a una colonna, questa proprietà restituisce <xref:System.String.Empty>.

trans-unit.source: Performs the default action associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'azione predefinita associata all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The default action is indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.DefaultAction%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: L'azione predefinita è indicato dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.DefaultAction%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: per chiamare codice non gestito.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valore di autorizzazione: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Nome di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject> is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.HeaderText%2A> property of the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject> è lo stesso come il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.HeaderText%2A> proprietà della cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" />.

trans-unit.source: Navigates to another accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Passa a un altro oggetto accessibile.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents an object in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> che rappresenta un oggetto nella direzione specificata.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> owns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> that is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: La tabella seguente descrive quale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> possiede il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> (metodo).

trans-unit.source: Parameter value
trans-unit.target: Valore del parametro

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descrizione

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> to the right of the current header cell.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> a destra della cella di intestazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> to the left of the current header cell.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> a sinistra della cella di intestazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> after the current header cell.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> dopo la cella di intestazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> before the current header cell.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> prima cella di intestazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.
trans-unit.target: Primo oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> Restituisce il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell> se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> proprietà `true`.

trans-unit.source: The last <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.
trans-unit.target: Ultimo oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.

trans-unit.source: The direction that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> method moves when you specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Previous> depends on whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has right-to-left support enabled.
trans-unit.target: La direzione che il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> metodo sposta quando si specifica <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Previous> dipende dal fatto che il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> ha abilitato il supporto da destra a sinistra.

trans-unit.source: For example, if right-to-left support is enabled, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> will return the same accessible object when you specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Left>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se è attivato il supporto da destra a sinistra, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> restituirà lo stesso oggetto accessibile quando si specifica <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Left>.

trans-unit.source: If right-to-left support is not enabled, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> will return the same object when you specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Right>.
trans-unit.target: Se non è abilitato il supporto da destra a sinistra, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> restituirà lo stesso oggetto quando si specifica <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Right>.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: per chiamare codice non gestito.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valore di autorizzazione: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento padre dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The parent of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Elemento padre di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il ruolo di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.RowHeader" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.RowHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection" />.

trans-unit.source: Modifies the column selection depending on the selection mode.
trans-unit.target: Modifica la selezione delle colonne in base alla modalità di selezione.

trans-unit.source: If the owning cell does not belong to a column, no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: Se la cella di appartenenza non appartiene a una colonna, viene eseguita alcuna azione.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the following table describes the action performed for each `flags` value.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, la tabella seguente descrive l'azione eseguita per ogni `flags` valore.

trans-unit.source: Parameter value
trans-unit.target: Valore del parametro

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: Operazione

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control that contains the owning cell has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect>, the column containing the cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controllo contenente la cella di appartenenza ha un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> valore della proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect>, la colonna contenente la cella è selezionata.

trans-unit.source: If the column containing the cell is selected, the selection is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Se la colonna contenente la cella è selezionata, la selezione viene annullata.

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection> values
trans-unit.target: Tutti gli altri <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection> valori

trans-unit.source: No action is taken.
trans-unit.target: Nessuna operazione.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: per chiamare codice non gestito.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valore di autorizzazione: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit di valori di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selectable" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selectable" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.State%2A> property value always includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selectable> value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.State%2A> valore della proprietà include sempre il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selectable> valore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.State%2A> includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selected> value if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> that contains the cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.State%2A> include il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selected> valore se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> contenente la cella è selezionata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.State%2A> includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Offscreen> value if the owning cell is not currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.State%2A> include il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Offscreen> valore se la cella di appartenenza non è attualmente visualizzata.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.Owner" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Value%2A> property is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Value%2A> proprietà è lo stesso come il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Name%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: per chiamare codice non gestito.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valore di autorizzazione: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
